summary.span: 表示控制項，此控制項是由可以將容器的顯示區分成兩個可以調整大小之面板的可移動軸所組成。

span.span: Represents a control consisting of a movable bar that divides a container's display area into two resizable panels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將控制項加入兩個可調整大小的面板，以及您可以新增其他控制現有建立許多可調整大小的面板顯示區域。You can add controls to the two resizable panels, and you can add other controls to existing panels to create many resizable display areas. 使用將容器的顯示區域的控制項 (例如)，並允許使用者加入至控制項的調整大小面板。Use the control to divide the display area of a container (such as a ) and allow the user to resize controls that are added to the panels. 當使用者通過滑鼠指標分隔器，而游標會變更，指出控制項控制項可以調整大小。When the user passes the mouse pointer over the splitter, the cursor changes to indicate that the controls inside the control can be resized. > [!NOTE] > 舊版的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]僅支援控制項。Previous versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] only support the control. 在設計階段，也可以簡化控制項位置。 also eases control placement at design time. 例如，若要建立類似於 Windows 檔案總管 視窗，加入控制權傳輸至並設定其屬性`DockStyle.Fill`。For example, to create a window similar to Windows Explorer, add a control to a and set its property to `DockStyle.Fill`. 新增控制權傳輸至並設定其屬性`DockStyle.Fill`。Add a control to the and set its property to `DockStyle.Fill`. 若要完成版面配置，加入控制項，並設定其屬性`DockStyle.Fill`有上佔用剩餘空間。To complete the layout, add a control and set its property to `DockStyle.Fill` to have the occupy the remaining space on the . 在執行階段，使用者可以再調整大小兩個控制項使用分隔器的寬度。At run time, the user can then resize the width of both controls using the splitter. 使用屬性可指定控制項不連同調整或其他容器。Use the property to specify that a control should not be resized along with the or other container. 使用以指定用來分隔您的表單上的起點。Use to specify where the splitter starts on your form. 使用指定像素，以分隔器移動一次。Use to specify how many pixels the splitter moves at a time. 預設值為是一個像素。The default for is one pixel. 使用和來指定如何關閉的分隔列可以移至外部邊緣面板。Use and to specify how close the splitter bar can be moved to the outside edge of a panel. 面板的預設最小大小為 25 像素。The default minimum size of a panel is 25 pixels. 使用屬性來指定水平方向。Use the property to specify horizontal orientation. 預設方向是垂直。The default orientation of the is vertical. 使用屬性，以指定的框線樣式協調其與您加入的控制項的框線樣式的框線樣式及。Use the property to specify the border style of the and coordinate its border style with the border style of controls that you add to the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例同時顯示垂直和水平。The following code example shows both a vertical and horizontal . 垂直分隔器移動 10 像素為單位。The vertical splitter moves in 10-pixel increments. 垂直的左的面板包含控制項，以及其右面板包含水平。The left panel of the vertical contains a control, and its right panel contains a horizontal . 水平的兩個面板填滿控制項和上方面板定義為，讓它不會調整容器的大小時不調整大小。Both panels of the horizontal are filled with controls, and the top panel is defined as a so that it does not resize when you resize the container. 移動垂直分割引發事件，表示在此範例中的資料指標樣式變更。Moving the vertical splitter raises the event, signified in this example by a change to the cursor style. 移動分隔器停止時，就會引發事件。The event is raised when you stop moving the splitter. 這被以在這個範例還原成預設值的資料指標樣式。This is signified in this example by the cursor style reverting to the default. remarks.format: ## Remarks 自動捲動邊界為任何子控制項的可捲動父控制項邊緣之間的距離。The auto-scroll margin is the distance between any child controls and the edges of the scrollable parent control. 大小也會加入可捲動的控制項來判斷是否需要捲軸中包含任何子控制項的大小。The size is added to the size of any child controls contained in the scrollable control to determine if scroll bars are needed. 屬性時可捲動父控制項調整大小或個別子控制項帶入 檢視中，會評估，並且用來判斷是否必須顯示捲軸。The property is evaluated when the parent scrollable control is resized or the individual child controls are brought into view, and is used to determine if scroll bars must be displayed. 從判斷是否必須顯示捲軸的計算中排除停駐的控制項。Docked controls are excluded from the calculations that determine if scroll bars must be displayed. 從子控制項的邊緣的距離，以可捲動父控制項是否指派給的值小於屬性和屬性設定為`true`，適當的捲軸顯示。If the distance from the edge of a child control to the parent scrollable control is less than the value assigned to the property and the property is set to `true`, the appropriate scroll bar is displayed. 這個屬性與這個類別無關。This property is not relevant to this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項的內容可能會因許多原因而; 變更包括顯示資料的變更。子控制項，加入版面配置和邊框間距變更;或系統字型、 語言或解析的變更。The contents of a control may change for many reasons; including display data changes; addition of child controls; layout and padding changes; or system font, language, or resolution changes. 如果屬性設定為`true`、會自動調整大小以包含它的內容，雖然它會永遠不會調整大小必須小於其原始。If the property is set to `true`, the will resize automatically to encompass its contents, although it will never be resized to be smaller than its original . 這項作業會維護控制項的。This operation will maintain the control’s . 這個屬性與這個類別無關。This property is not relevant to this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果會引發這個事件以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動變更屬性。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`SplitContainer1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `SplitContainer1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以停駐可以固定到其容器，或您的任何邊緣容器的所有邊緣以便完全填滿容器。You can dock a to any edge of its container, or you can dock a to all edges of the container so that the entirely fills the container. 例如，將此屬性設定為附加的左邊的緣其容器的左邊。For example, set this property to to attach the left edge of the to the left edge of its container. 停駐控制項疊置順序。Controls are docked in z-order. > [!NOTE] > 疊置順序對應至螢幕的深度維度和 x 順序 y 順序對應水平和垂直維度中，分別。The z-order corresponds to the depth dimension of the screen, and the x-order and y-order corresponds to the horizontal and vertical dimensions, respectively. 疊置順序會定義控制項或 windows 可以重疊或佔據螢幕上的相同空間的物件會出現在前面。Z-order defines which object appears in front of which, in cases where controls or windows can overlap or occupy the same space on the screen. 控制項或最上層的疊置順序視窗會顯示在所有其他的控制項或 windows 和 0 中的索引所參考屬性。A control or window at the top of the z-order appears on top of all other controls or windows and is referenced by an index of 0 in the property. 控制項或視窗底部的疊置順序會顯示底下所有其他的控制項或 windows 和索引所參考`(Controls.Count-1)`中屬性。A control or window at the bottom of the z-order appears underneath all other controls or windows and is referenced by an index of `(Controls.Count-1)` in the property. 如需錨定和停駐控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 建立 Multipane 使用者介面搭配 Windows Form](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-multipane-user-interface-with-windows-forms.md)。For more information about anchoring and docking controls, see [How to: Create a Multipane User Interface with Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-multipane-user-interface-with-windows-forms.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示垂直分割其屬性設定為`Fill`。The following code example shows a vertical splitter whose property is set to `Fill`. 也會顯示其他的垂直分割的基本屬性。Other basic properties of a vertical splitter are also shown. 這個範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息處理對話方塊按鍵字元，例如索引標籤、 向左鍵、 向右箭號、 向上鍵和向下箭號的前置處理期間呼叫這個方法。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog box key characters, such as TAB, LEFT ARROW, RIGHT ARROW, UP ARROW, and DOWN ARROW. 不會處理包含 ALT 或控制項的修飾詞的索引鍵。Keys that include the ALT or CONTROL modifiers are not handled. 只有當呼叫這個方法方法表示控制項未處理的索引鍵。This method is called only if the method indicates that the control is not processing the key. 只傳送至父代的字元方法或傳回`false`如果控制項沒有父代。The simply sends the character to the parent's method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent. 類別會覆寫此方法以執行實際處理對話方塊按鍵。The class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog box keys. 只有當控制項裝載在 Windows Forms 應用程式，或為 ActiveX 控制項，執行的階段會呼叫這個方法。The run time calls this method only when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按下 TAB 鍵時，則會將輸入的焦點設定為表單的定位順序中的下一個控制項。When the user presses the TAB key, the input focus is set to the next control in the tab order of the form. 設定至`true`以使其可以搭配方向鍵以及滑鼠移動分隔器提供輸入的焦點。Set to `true` to give input focus to a splitter so that it can be moved with the arrow keys as well as with the mouse. 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，設定至`false`排除分隔器，以及任何控制項中所包含的從定位順序中的控制項集合。Starting in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], setting to `false` excludes the splitter and any of the controls that are contained in the from the collection of controls in the tab order. 若要讓使用 TAB 鍵來取得焦點的控制項，請建立繼承自控制項。To enable controls to get focus by using the TAB key, create a control that inherits from . 建立新的屬性，名為`TabStop`並覆寫方法。Create a new property named `TabStop` and override the method. 下列範例會示範如何完成這項作業。The following example demonstrates how to accomplish this. [!code-csharp[SplitContainerTabStop#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/splitcontainertabstop/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SplitContainerTabStop#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/splitcontainertabstop/vb/module1.vb#1)] 您可以藉由設定控制項的操作索引標籤順序屬性值。You can manipulate the tab order by setting the control's property value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有訊息都會都傳送至方法之後被篩透過方法。All messages are sent to the method after getting filtered through the method. 方法完全對應於 Windows `WindowProc` 函式。The method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function. 如需有關如何處理 Windows 訊息的詳細資訊，請參閱`WindowProc`的 Platform SDK 文件中的函式http://msdn.microsoft.com。For more information about processing Windows messages, see the `WindowProc` function in the Platform SDK documentation at http://msdn.microsoft.com.
